import React, {useState} from 'react' import Cookies from 'universal-cookie' import axios from 'axios' import signIn from '../assets/signIn.png' const cookies = new Cookies() const initialState = { username: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' } const Auth = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState(initialState) const [isSignup, setIsSignup] = useState(false) const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({... form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) console.log(form) } const switchMode = () => { setIsSignup((prevIsSignup) => !prevIsSignup) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const {username, password} = form const URL = 'https://localhost:5000/auth' const {data: {token, userId, hashedPassword}} = await axios.post(`${URL}/${isSignup ? 'signup' : 'login'}`, username, password) cookies.set('token', token) cookies.set('username', username) cookies.set('userId', userId) if(isSignup){ cookies.set('hashedPassword', hashedPassword) } window.location.reload() console.log(form) } return (

{isSignup ? 'signup' : 'signIn'}

{isSignup && (
)}

{isSignup ? "Already signed up?" : "Don't have an account?"} {isSignup ? 'Sign In' : 'Sign Up'}

) } export default Auth
